changes.contentLibrary: Content library with folders and type filters
changes.playbackHistory: Playback history with datetime and content filters
changes.playerScreenshots: Player screenshots with video frame capture
changes.multiLanguage: Multi-language support (EN, UK, FR, DE, PL)
changes.autoDeployUpdate: Auto-deploy via GHCR + Watchtower with update management UI
changes.cctvStreams: CCTV Streams — surveillance camera management with mosaic/rotation display modes
changes.historyFilters: History page datetime and content name filters
changes.cctvContentIntegration: CCTV streams integrated into Content page with auto-start from player schedule
changes.updateReliability: Improved auto-update reliability — update trigger no longer fails when containers restart
changes.cctvStreamFixes: CCTV stream fixes: auto-start on page open, keepalive ping, list view edit button, stable modal size
changes.reliableUpdates: Reliable update system — replaced Watchtower with docker compose-based updater, fixed stale version cache after update
changes.cctvLiveView: Live CCTV stream on player detail page — auto-refreshing snapshot with LIVE badge and keepalive
changes.cctvPolish: CCTV streams: live preview in content library, auto-restart on config change, snapshot thumbnails, player deploy with full URL
changes.friendlyUpdateUx: Friendly update UX — auto-detect version change after update and prompt page reload
changes.cctvLiveViewFix: CCTV live view fix — show live stream only when CCTV is actively running, removed manual toggle button
changes.standardPlayerCompat: Standard Anthias player compatibility — auto-detect custom features (schedule, playback control, screenshot) and hide unsupported UI elements
changes.reliableUpdateProcess: Reliable update process — removed build directive from production compose, added --no-build flag to updater
changes.cctvNowPlayingDetection: CCTV live preview now only shows when the player is actually displaying a CCTV stream, not just when a CCTV asset exists in the library
changes.emptySlotFallback: Empty schedule slots now fall back to the default slot instead of showing splash screen
changes.registerTokenAuth: Player registration endpoint secured with optional Bearer token (PLAYER_REGISTER_TOKEN)
changes.eslintSetup: ESLint 9 with TypeScript support added, moduleResolution fixed to bundler
changes.ssrfDnsFix: OG preview no longer blocks external URLs when DNS is temporarily unavailable
changes.silentExceptionLogging: Added warning logs to previously silent exception handlers (CCTV stream start, thumbnail update)
changes.forgetPlayerButton: Forget player button on player detail page — remove player from fleet manager
changes.testSuiteFix: Fixed test suite — all 28 tests pass (auth, og:image mock)
changes.cctvStreamLifecycle: CCTV stream lifecycle — ffmpeg stops on config save, restarts on preview open, stops on preview close; streams only run when needed by schedule or preview
changes.provisionPlayer: Remote provisioning — install Anthias on a fresh Raspberry Pi directly from Fleet Manager via SSH
changes.tailscaleIntegration: Tailscale VPN integration — connect to remote players via Tailscale with automatic fallback
changes.provisionFixes: Provisioning fixes — Docker group permission fix, VLC framebuffer output, viewer TTY allocation
